hello.text:
Hello! I am **MIRA**. How can I *assist* you today?

Here are some things I can do:
- Answer questions
- Generate code
- Create images

help.text:
Sure! Here are some ways I can help you:
- Answer questions on various topics
- Generate code snippets
- Create images based on descriptions
- Provide explanations and tutorials

joke.text: Why did the programmer quit his job? Because he didn't get arrays!
